Goal.label: Goal
Goal.tooltip: Amount of Points needed to advance to the next streak.

GoalMin.label: Goal Min
GoalMin.tooltip: Minimum value for the incremental Goals.

GoalMax.label: Goal Max
GoalMax.tooltip: Maximum value for the incremental Goals.

GoalIncrement.label: Increment Goal By
GoalIncrement.tooltip:
Increments the Goal by the defined amount, each time a Streak is completed.

(Leave at zero to disable.)

CountReSubs.label: Allow Resubs
CountReSubs.tooltip:
Enables ReSubs to be counted as well.

(Gifted-Sub will always be counted.)

BitsPointValue.label: Bits Point Value
BitsPointValue.tooltip: Point Value of Bits that exceed the minimum Bits amount.

CountBits.label: Allow Bits
CountBits.tooltip: Point Value of Bits that exceed the minimum Bits amount.

CountBitsOnce.label: Only Count Once
CountBitsOnce.tooltip: Only count Bits that exceed the specified amount once, even if they're a multiple of the minimum Bits amount.

CountBitsCumulative.label: Cumulative Bits
CountBitsCumulative.tooltip: Allows Bits that are below the minimum amount to pile up until they exceed the minimum amount and then will be counted as normal together.

DonationMinAmount.label: Donation Amount
DonationMinAmount.tooltip: Minimum amount that needs to be donated for the Donation to be counted.

DonationPointValue.label: Donation Point Value
DonationPointValue.tooltip: Point Value of a Donation that exceeds the minimum donation amount.

CountDonations.label: Allow Donations
CountDonations.tooltip: Allows Donations above the specified amount to be counted as Subs.

CountDonationsOnce.label: Only Count Once
CountDonationsOnce.tooltip: Only counts Donations that exceed the specified amount once, even if they're a multiple of the minimum Donation amount.

CountDonationsCumulative.label: Cumulative Donations
CountDonationsCumulative.tooltip: Allows Donations that are below the minimum amount to pile up until they exceed the minimum amount and then will be counted as a normal Donation together.

Sub1.label: Sub
Sub1.tooltip: Point value for a Tier 1 Sub.

ReSub1.label: Resub
ReSub1.tooltip: Point value for a Tier 1 Resub.

GiftSub1.label: Gift-Sub
GiftSub1.tooltip: Point value for a Tier 1 Gifted-Sub.

GiftReSub1.label: Gifted-Resub
GiftReSub1.tooltip: Point value for a Tier 1 Gifted-Resub.

Sub2.label: Sub
Sub2.tooltip: Point value for a Tier 2 Sub.

ReSub2.label: Resub
ReSub2.tooltip: Point value for a Tier 2 Resub.

GiftSub2.label: Gift-Sub
GiftSub2.tooltip: Point value for a Tier 2 Gifted-Sub.

GiftReSub2.label: Gifted-Resub
GiftReSub2.tooltip: Point value for a Tier 2 Gifted-Resub.

Sub3.label: Sub
Sub3.tooltip: Point value for a Tier 3 Sub.

ReSub3.label: Resub Tier 3
ReSub3.tooltip: Point value for a Tier 3 Resub.

GiftSub3.label: Gift-Sub
GiftSub3.tooltip: Point value for a Tier 3 Gifted-Sub.

GiftReSub3.label: Gifted-Resub
GiftReSub3.tooltip: Point value for a Tier 3 Gifted-Resub.

AddPoint.label: + Point
AddPoint.tooltip: Increments the Point counter by one.

SubtractPoint.label: - Point
SubtractPoint.tooltip: Decrements the Point counter by one.

AddStreak.label: + Streak
AddStreak.tooltip: Increments the Streak counter by one.

AddStreak5.label: + Streak (5)
AddStreak5.tooltip: Increments the Streak counter by five.

AddStreak10.label: + Streak (10)
AddStreak10.tooltip: Increments the Streak counter by ten.

SubtractStreak.label: - Streak
SubtractStreak.tooltip: Decrements the Streak counter by one.

SubtractStreak5.label: - Streak (5)
SubtractStreak5.tooltip: Decrements the Streak counter by five.

SubtractStreak10.label: - Streak (10)
SubtractStreak10.tooltip: Decrements the Streak counter by ten.

AddToGoal.label: + Goal
AddToGoal.tooltip: Increments the Subs Per Streak goal by one.

SubtractFromGoal.label: - Goal
SubtractFromGoal.tooltip: Decrements the Subs Per Streak goal by one.

SocketToken.label: Socket Token
SocketToken.tooltip:
Insert your Streamlabs Socket Token.

(You can find your Token under Settings > API Settings > API Tokens, on the Streamlabs Website.)

RefreshOverlay.label: Refresh Overlay
RefreshOverlay.tooltip: Forces a refresh on the Overlay.
